name: Sauce's Prayer
description:
The Cult of Sauce has hidden the secret recipe to summon an almighty power. Sneak past cult members to collect the 5 secret sauces, preform the ritual, and achieve omnipotence. This... is Sauce's Prayer.

Made in 48 hours for the February 2023 Spartasoft Game Jam.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

E - Interact

CREDITS

Nicole Stocks - 3D Artist, Animator, Tech Artist, Lighting

Collin Cole - Gameplay Programmer

Adam Grisdale - Designer, Composer, SFX

Special thanks:

Drew White - A.I. programmer
